monogr.title: An exposition of the morall lavv, or Ten Commandements of almightie God : set dovvne by vvay of exercitations. VVherein is contained an explanation of diverse questions and positions for the right understanding thereof. Together with an explication of these scriptures which depend upon, or belong unto every one of the commandements. All which are cleared out of the originall languages, the customes of the Iewes, and the distinctions of the schoolemen. By Iohn Weemse, of Lathocker in Scotland, Preacher of Christs Gospell
monogr.author: Weemes, John
